author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a 2021 profile to the "direct" simulation of PPS. This profile corresponds to our current best guess for Run3 start.

This PR also adds a default geometry (Roman Pot positions) file for Run3 with reasonable distances beam-RP:
  * 2 mm for horizontal RPs
  * 7 mm for vertical RPs

#### PR validation:

Below two test comparisons.

PPS reco of Run2 data: not affected by this PR, as expected.
![reco_cmp](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17830858/103643449-0040e700-4f55-11eb-9310-a77dfb1090e8.png)

PPS direct simulation:
  * for Run2 profiles: no change, as intended
  * for 2021: only available with this PR, distributions reasonable (e.g. x distributions of tracks start at about 2mm).

![dirsim_cmp](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17830858/103643436-f919d900-4f54-11eb-8cc4-fdf90d9799b1.png)
title: PPS direct simulation: add 2021 profile
